content: I'm selling $50 worth of Skype Credits for 40% off. I can sell more depending on demand. Long-term buyers can get even more discount.What you can do with Skype Credits?1. Skype Credit is a convenient and easy way to pay for Skype features that are not free. You can use it to make calls to mobiles and landlines, and send SMS text messages, all at Skypeâ€™s low rates.2. Use Skype Credit to purchase Subscriptions and Skype Numbers (choose from up to 25 countries/regions).3. Buy Skype Credit as a gift or send Skype Credit.Why Skype number is helpful?A Skype Number is a second phone number which is attached to your Skype account, allowing you to answer incoming calls in your Skype app anywhere. People can call you from their mobile or landline and you pick the call up in Skype.Get a professional number for the office.Reliable and convenient solution for your business travels or off-site work. Let Skype number make your life easier.Manage your calls in one place and save money.Skype provides you with simple and accessible admin to handle all your Skype numbers or subscriptions.Also, you can use it to activate services like WhatsApp by using Callme function.Send me a private message if interested! For more information on Skype Credits visit official Skype website!
